mapper.select: SELECT TM.MEMBER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL,TM.MEMBER_NICKNAME,TF.FRIEND_DESCRIPTION FROM TBL_FRIEND TF JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON TM.ID = TF.FRIEND_ID WHERE TF.MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND TF.FRIEND_REQUEST_STATUS = 'ACCEPTED'

SELECT MEM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, MES.MESSAGE_TITLE, MES.MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM TBL_MESSAGE MES JOIN TBL_SENT_MESSAGE SM ON SM.MESSAGE_ID = MES.ID AND MES.MEMBER_SENT_ID = #{id} JOIN TBL_MEMBER MEM ON MEM.ID = MES.MEMBER_SENT_ID WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY SM.ID DESC

SELECT MEM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, MES.MESSAGE_TITLE, MES.MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM TBL_MESSAGE MES JOIN TBL_RECEIVED_MESSAGE RM ON RM.MESSAGE_ID = MES.ID AND MES.MEMBER_RECEIVED_ID = #{id} JOIN TBL_MEMBER MEM ON MEM.ID = MES.MEMBER_RECEIVED_ID WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY RM.ID DESC
